title: Sanfɛla Laseli - Alabatoso Orbital
heading: Yɔrɔ Laseli
intro: Orbital Temple bolodara ka Labɔ PSLV (Polar Satellite Launch Vehicle) kɔnɔ Nowanburukalo tle 28, 2025 sàn ka Bɔ Satish Dhawan sanfɛla-yɔrɔ la Sriharikota, Ɛndujamana na.
partnership: Orbital Temple daminɛ ye jɛkafɔ ye NewSpace India Limited (NSIL) cɛ, Ɛndujamana gɔfɛrɛnaman ka tɔn min bɛ Sanfɛla Minisiri bolo, Antrix Corporation, ani dɔnkotigi. Nin jɛ-ka-baara in bɛ kɛ fɛnba ye seko ni dɔnko la sankolola ɲinini na, ka Ɛndujamana ka sanfɛla porogaramu fara ɲɔgɔn kan ni seko ni dɔnko yeli ye min ye bɛɛjɛfanga ye.

risks.heading: Farati minnu bɛ a la
risks.paragraph1: Sateliti in jɔra walasa ka yɛrɛyɛrɛ jugumanba ni funteni sɛgɛsɛgɛli muɲu, wa a sɛgɛsɛgɛra kosɛbɛ. Nka, sankolola fɛnw bɛ na ni faratiw ye minnu bɛ sɔrɔ u yɛrɛ la. Ni sateliti tiɲɛna a bɔli walima a bilali sen fɛ, walima n’a ma se ka kumaɲɔgɔnya sigi sen kan n’an ka dugukolo kan jɔyɔrɔw ye, an bɛna baara kɛ walasa ka gɛlɛya o gɛlɛyaw ɲɛnabɔ ani k’u ɲɛnabɔ. Sateliti in bɛ ni sistɛmuw ye minnu tɛ baara kɛ ani minnu bɛ se ka kɛ kɔfɛ, minnu dabɔra walasa ka cidenyabaara ɲɛtaa seko caya.
risks.paragraph2: Ka fara o kan, sateliti bɛ se ka to a ka taama na fo ka se san 10 ma ni fiɲɛ cogoyaw walima fɛn wɛrɛw bɛ kɛ sababu ye ka jiribolo toli ka kɔn o ɲɛ. Hali n’an y’a dilan walasa a ka mɛn san tan ni kɔ la, a si hakɛ yɛrɛ bɛ bɔ cogoyaw la an tɛ se ka minnu kunbɛn pewu.
risks.paragraph3: Ni laseli fɔlɔ ma ɲɛ, walima n’an ma se k’o cidenyabaara in kɛ i n’a fɔ an y’a labɛn cogo min na, an bɛna sira wɛrɛw ɲini ka taa ɲɛ, n’a bɛ se ka kɛ ko laseli kɛcogo filanan bɛ se ka kɛ ni baarakɛnafolo ye min bɛ sɔrɔ, jɛɲɔgɔnya ni cidenyabaara wɛrɛw ye, walima k’a ɲini ka sɛbɛnni kɛ i n’a fɔ seko ni dɔnko baara in lakalicogo dɔ, min bɛ tali kɛ laɲini ni dantigɛli la.

imageAlts.satellite: Sateliti min bɛ wele ko Orbital Temple
